to snip, to cut, to nip, to trim

k_ele.e: 我が身をつねって人の痛さを知れ
我が身を抓って人の痛さを知れ

r_ele.r: わがみをつねってひとのいたさをしれ

sense.gloss: walk a mile in other's shoes to understand their suffering, you can't appreciate others' suffering until you've gone through it yourself, pinch yourself and know others' pain
to be bewitched by a fox, to be confused
